35  package fr.mcc.ginco.extjs.view.utils;
36  
37  import fr.mcc.ginco.ark.IIDGeneratorService;
38  import fr.mcc.ginco.beans.Language;
39  import fr.mcc.ginco.beans.Thesaurus;
40  import fr.mcc.ginco.beans.ThesaurusOrganization;
41  import fr.mcc.ginco.exceptions.BusinessException;
42  import fr.mcc.ginco.extjs.view.pojo.ThesaurusView;
43  import fr.mcc.ginco.services.ILanguagesService;
44  import fr.mcc.ginco.services.IThesaurusFormatService;
45  import fr.mcc.ginco.services.IThesaurusService;
46  import fr.mcc.ginco.services.IThesaurusTypeService;
47  import fr.mcc.ginco.utils.DateUtil;
48  import fr.mcc.ginco.utils.LanguageComparator;
49  import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
50  import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
51  import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
52  
53  import javax.inject.Inject;
54  import javax.inject.Named;
55  import java.util.*;
56  
57  /**
58   * Small class responsible for converting between
59   * {@link Thesaurus} object and its view {@link ThesaurusView}.
60   */
61  @Component("thesaurusViewConverter")
62  public class ThesaurusViewConverter {
63  	
64  	@Inject
65  	@Named("thesaurusService")
66  	private IThesaurusService thesaurusService;
67  	
68  	@Inject
69  	@Named("languagesService")
70  	private ILanguagesService languagesService;    
71  
72  	@Inject
73  	@Named("thesaurusTypeService")
74  	private IThesaurusTypeService thesaurusTypeService;
75  
76  	@Inject
77  	@Named("thesaurusFormatService")
78  	private IThesaurusFormatService thesaurusFormatService;	
79  	
80  	@Inject
81  	@Named("generatorService")
82  	private IIDGeneratorService generatorService;	
83  
84  	
85  	@Value("${ginco.default.language}") private String defaultLanguage;
86  
87      /**
88       * Main method for conversion from view to object.
89       * @param source view to get data from.
90       * @return real object.
91       * @throws BusinessException
92       */
93  	public Thesaurus convert(ThesaurusView source) throws BusinessException {
94  		Thesaurus hibernateRes;
95  
96  		if ("".equals(source.getId())) {
97  			hibernateRes = new Thesaurus();
98  			hibernateRes.setCreated(DateUtil.nowDate());
99  			hibernateRes.setIdentifier(generatorService.generate(Thesaurus.class));
100 		} else {
101 			hibernateRes = thesaurusService.getThesaurusById(source.getId());
102 		}
103 
104 		hibernateRes.setContributor(source.getContributor());
105 		hibernateRes.setCoverage(source.getCoverage());
106 		hibernateRes.setDate(DateUtil.nowDate());
107 		hibernateRes.setDescription(source.getDescription());
108 		hibernateRes.setPublisher(source.getPublisher());
109 		hibernateRes.setRelation(source.getRelation());
110 		hibernateRes.setRights(source.getRights());
111 		hibernateRes.setSource(source.getSource());
112 		hibernateRes.setSubject(source.getSubject());
113 		hibernateRes.setTitle(source.getTitle());
114 		hibernateRes.setDefaultTopConcept(source.getDefaultTopConcept());
115 		hibernateRes.setFormat(thesaurusFormatService
116 				.getThesaurusFormatById(source.getFormat()));
117 		hibernateRes.setType(thesaurusTypeService.getThesaurusTypeById(source
118 				.getType()));
119 		ThesaurusOrganization thesaurusOrganization;
120 		if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(source.getCreatorName())
121 				|| StringUtils.isNotEmpty(source.getCreatorHomepage())) {
122 			if (hibernateRes.getCreator() != null) {
123 				thesaurusOrganization = hibernateRes.getCreator();
124 			} else {
125 				thesaurusOrganization = new ThesaurusOrganization();
126 			}
127 			thesaurusOrganization.setName(source.getCreatorName());
128 			thesaurusOrganization.setHomepage(source.getCreatorHomepage());
129 			hibernateRes.setCreator(thesaurusOrganization);
130 		} else {
131 			if (hibernateRes.getCreator() != null) {
132 				hibernateRes.setCreator(null);
133 			}
134 		}
135 		List<String> languages = source.getLanguages();
136 		Set<Language> realLanguages = new HashSet<Language>();
137 
138 		for (String language : languages) {
139 			Language lang = languagesService.getLanguageById(language);
140 			if (lang != null) {
141 				realLanguages.add(lang);
142 			}
143 		}
144 
145 		hibernateRes.setLang(realLanguages);
146 
147 		return hibernateRes;
148 	}
149 
150     /**
151      * Main method for conversion from object to view.
152      * @param source object to get data from.
153      * @return view object.
154      * @throws BusinessException
155      */
156 	public ThesaurusView convert(Thesaurus source) {
157 		ThesaurusView view = new ThesaurusView();
158 		if (source != null) {
159 			view.setId(source.getIdentifier());
160 			view.setContributor(source.getContributor());
161 			view.setCoverage(source.getCoverage());
162 
163             if(source.getDate() != null) {
164             	view.setDate (DateUtil.toString(source.getDate()));
165             }
166             view.setDescription (source.getDescription());
167             view.setPublisher(source.getPublisher());
168             view.setRelation (source.getRelation());
169             view.setRights(source.getRights());
170             view.setSource(source.getSource());
171             view.setSubject(source.getSubject());
172             view.setTitle(source.getTitle());
173             view.setCreated(DateUtil.toString(source.getCreated()));
174 
175 			if (source.getCreator() != null) {
176 				view.setCreatorName(source.getCreator().getName());
177 				view.setCreatorHomepage(source.getCreator().getHomepage());
178 			}
179 			if (source.isDefaultTopConcept() != null) {
180 				view.setDefaultTopConcept(source.isDefaultTopConcept());
181 			} else {
182 				view.setDefaultTopConcept(false);
183 				}
184 			if (source.getFormat() != null) {
185 				view.setFormat(source.getFormat().getIdentifier());
186 			}
187 			if (source.getType() != null) {
188 				view.setType(source.getType().getIdentifier());
189 			}
190 
191 			ArrayList<Language> langList = new ArrayList<Language>();
192 			for (Language lang : source.getLang()) {
193 				langList.add(lang);
194 			}
195 			Collections.sort(langList, new LanguageComparator(defaultLanguage));
196 			Collections.reverse(langList);
197 			ArrayList<String> langLabels = new ArrayList<String>();
198 			for (Language lang:langList) {
199 				langLabels.add(lang.getId());
200 			}
201 			view.setLanguages(langLabels);
202 		}
203 		return view;
204 	}
205 }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
